meta.article_title: A Step-by-Step Sequence to Learning Pendulum Serves

pendulum_serve.probleme: Learn Pendulum Serve with Great Spin and Control

debutant.nom: Spin the ball to make it jump to left side
debutant.description: Hold racket out, toss ball, and spin bottom with right-to-left motion. Catch and repeat until you can really spin the ball.

exercices_complementaires.nom: Spin and control the ball on table
exercices_complementaires.description: Repeat step two, except don't catch the ball - let it go. Practice until you can spin the ball and control it to bounce over net after one bounce.
